alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:25PM CDT until June 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL TANGIPAHOA AND NORTHERN WASHINGTON PARISHES... WALTHALL AND SOUTHERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tylertown, or 13 miles west of Kokomo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Magnolia, Tylertown, Varnado, Salem, Dexter, Mount Herman and Angie. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi near mile marker 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
